thread.title: SparkLAN Launches New-Generation 802.11n IOT Module for Embedded Wi-Fi Applications
thread.title_full: SparkLAN Launches New-Generation 802.11n IOT Module for Embedded Wi-Fi Applications - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: SparkLAN Launches New-Generation 802.11n IOT Module for Embedded Wi-Fi Applications
text:
SparkLAN Launches New-Generation 802.11n IOT Module for Embedded Wi-Fi Applications
SparkLAN WSDB-102GN IOT Module integrates Broadcom BCM43362 chipset, Rich I/O interface & Antenna for Design Flexibility.
Taipei, Taiwan, October 17, 2015 --( PR.com )-- SparkLAN has launched new generation WiFi modules to support the latest 802.11b/g/n wireless standards for the Internet of Things (IoT) market.
SparkLAN WSDB-102GN is a wireless 802.11b/g/n IOT Module with extremely cost and power efficient IOT solution, which offer excellent system performance for IoT connectivity with Broadcom BCM43362 chipset and baseband functionality. And powerful ARM Cortex-M4 microcontroller processor, produce an output power up to 15dBm, which is designed and approval by FCC and CE authorities.
WSDB-102GN supports multiplehardware interfaces, includes host interface through UART, and 2 peripheral interface through I2C and SPI. It carries multiple GPIO, capable to integrate the solution into wide range of hardware platforms, and interact seamlessly with any access point. WSDB-102GN includes an integrated antenna, but also offers option for external antenna, giving developers a wide range of possibilities for product development.
Apart from the size advantage, WSDB-102GN is a driver-free design, programed by Real-time OS(RTOS), with TCP/IP stacks included, vastly reduce the hardware / software integration effort.With a rich function command-list library, it makes WSDB-102GN a perfect solution for many IOT applications, such as remote monitoring system, asset tracking, security and industrial equipment and so much more.
Features:
802.11b/g/n IOT Module, Broadcom BCM43362, 1T1R
‧ Standard: 802.11b/g/n
‧ Host Interface: UART
‧ Chipset: Broadcom BCM43362
‧ Antenna: Integrated antenna or U.FL connector for external antenna, 1T1R
About SparkLAN Communication, Inc.
SparkLAN Communications, Inc., founded in 2002, is a broadband wireless networking solution provider subordinating to a worldwide tier 1 manufacturer. Focusing on wireless technology (802.11x), SparkLAN has had a proven track of taking leading edge technologies developed for four solutions: Embedded System, Wireless ISP, SOHO & Digital Home, and IP Surveillance. For more information, visit www.sparklan.com.
